welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Homewood, United States! Known for its charming small-town atmosphere and historical landmarks, we invite you to explore our city and discover all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories in Homewood."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Birmingham-Shuttlesworth International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is used primarily for domestic flights operated by Delta Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B serves domestic flights operated by American Airlines and Southwest Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
